name: Kenji Droullard
overview: Born in Tokyo, Kenji spent his formative years immersed in the language and culture of Japan. The Japanese sense of balance, harmony, and simplicity greatly influence his work as a graphic designer today. He was an entrepreneur and business owner early in his career, focusing on corporate identity and brand development. Kenji went on to study Visual Communication Design at University of Washington, a rigorous program with an emphasis in design thinking and effective communication.
